If current panellists Simon Cowell and Cheryl Cole quit to concentrate on the forthcoming US version of the show, it is rumoured Sharon Osbourne will resume her previous role on the judging panel. "The X Factor' is a great show and I thought I had a great year last year. Dannii Minogue - who won the competition last year with her act Matt Cardle - told the Daily Express newspaper: "I'm not worried about Sharon Osbourne coming back- it"s up to them to recruit whoever they want
